name: calibre-mcp
description: MCP server for automating Calibre ebook management
author: Sandra Schi

MAX_CONCURRENT_CONVERSIONS.description: Maximum number of concurrent ebook conversions

AUTO_UPDATE_METADATA.description: Automatically update metadata from online sources

DEFAULT_LANGUAGE.description: Default language for metadata and conversions

THUMBNAIL_WIDTH.description: Width of generated thumbnails in pixels

prompts.name: init_local_library_prompt
prompts.description: Initialize access to a local Calibre library
prompts.template: Set up access to my local Calibre library at {library_path}.

prompts.name: add_remote_server_prompt
prompts.description: Add a new remote Calibre content server
prompts.template: Add a new remote Calibre server named {server_name} at {url} with username {username} and password {password}. Display name: {display_name}.

prompts.name: switch_server_prompt
prompts.description: Switch between local and remote Calibre servers
prompts.template: Switch to {server_type} library access. Server name: {server_name}.

prompts.name: search_books_prompt
prompts.description: Search for books in the current library
prompts.template: Search for books matching {query} in my {library_type} library. Limit results to {limit} books.

prompts.name: get_book_details_prompt
prompts.description: Get detailed information about a specific book
prompts.template: Show me details for book with ID {book_id} from my {library_type} library.

prompts.name: get_library_info_prompt
prompts.description: Get information about the current library
prompts.template: Show me information about my current Calibre library.

prompts.name: list_servers_prompt
prompts.description: List all configured remote servers
prompts.template: Show me all configured Calibre servers.

prompts.name: remove_server_prompt
prompts.description: Remove a configured remote server
prompts.template: Remove the server named {server_name} from my configured Calibre servers.

prompts.name: update_credentials_prompt
prompts.description: Update credentials for a remote server
prompts.template: Update the credentials for server {server_name} with username {username} and password {password}.

prompts.name: add_book_prompt
prompts.description: Add a new book to the Calibre library
prompts.template: Add the book at {file_path} to my Calibre library with title {title}, author {author}, and series {series} with options {options}.

prompts.name: convert_book_prompt
prompts.description: Convert a book to a different format
prompts.template: Convert the book with ID {book_id} to {output_format} format and save to {output_path} with options {options}.

prompts.name: search_books_prompt
prompts.description: Search for books in the library
prompts.template: Find books matching {query} in my Calibre library with filters {filters} and sort by {sort_field} in {sort_order} order.

prompts.name: update_metadata_prompt
prompts.description: Update book metadata from online sources
prompts.template: Update metadata for book with ID {book_id} from {source} with options {options}.

prompts.name: export_library_prompt
prompts.description: Export the entire library or a selection of books
prompts.template: Export {selection} books to {output_dir} in {format} format with options {options}.

prompts.name: create_catalog_prompt
prompts.description: Generate a catalog of the library
prompts.template: Create a {format} catalog of my Calibre library with fields {fields} and save to {output_file} with options {options}.

prompts.name: manage_devices_prompt
prompts.description: Manage connected e-reader devices
prompts.template: {action} my {device_name} by {method} with options {options}.

prompts.name: edit_metadata_prompt
prompts.description: Edit book metadata directly
prompts.template: Update the {field} to {value} for book with ID {book_id} with options {options}.

prompts.name: bulk_operation_prompt
prompts.description: Perform an operation on multiple books
prompts.template: {action} all books matching {query} with options {options}.

prompts.name: manage_series_prompt
prompts.description: Manage book series information
prompts.template: {action} the series {series_name} with options {options}.

prompts.name: import_books_prompt
prompts.description: Import books from a directory or file
prompts.template: Import books from {source_path} to my Calibre library with options {options}.

prompts.name: export_books_prompt
prompts.description: Export books to a directory or file
prompts.template: Export books matching {query} to {output_path} in {format} format with options {options}.

prompts.name: fetch_news_prompt
prompts.description: Fetch news and convert to ebooks
prompts.template: Download and convert {publication} from {start_date} to {end_date} in {format} format with options {options}.

prompts.name: manage_tags_prompt
prompts.description: Manage book tags
prompts.template: {action} the tag {tag_name} to/from books matching {query} with options {options}.

prompts.name: search_replace_prompt
prompts.description: Search and replace text in book metadata
prompts.template: Replace '{search}' with '{replace}' in {field} for books matching {query} with options {options}.

prompts.name: manage_custom_columns_prompt
prompts.description: Manage custom columns in the library
prompts.template: {action} a custom column named {column_name} of type {column_type} with options {options}.

prompts.name: generate_cover_prompt
prompts.description: Generate or update book covers
prompts.template: {action} cover for book with ID {book_id} using {source} with options {options}.

prompts.name: manage_plugins_prompt
prompts.description: Manage Calibre plugins
prompts.template: {action} the {plugin_name} plugin with options {options}.

prompts.name: sync_with_device_prompt
prompts.description: Synchronize books with a connected device
prompts.template: {action} books with my {device_name} using profile {profile_name} with options {options}.

prompts.name: backup_library_prompt
prompts.description: Backup the Calibre library
prompts.template: Create a backup of my Calibre library at {backup_path} with options {options}.

prompts.name: restore_library_prompt
prompts.description: Restore the Calibre library from a backup
prompts.template: Restore my Calibre library from {backup_path} with options {options}.

prompts.name: manage_users_prompt
prompts.description: Manage Calibre-Web users
prompts.template: {action} user {username} with permissions {permissions} and options {options}.

prompts.name: configure_web_server_prompt
prompts.description: Configure the Calibre-Web server
prompts.template: Update {setting} to {value} in the Calibre-Web configuration with options {options}.

prompts.name: generate_reports_prompt
prompts.description: Generate library reports
prompts.template: Generate a {report_type} report for books matching {query} and save to {output_file} with options {options}.

prompts.name: manage_reading_lists_prompt
prompts.description: Create and manage reading lists
prompts.template: {action} reading list named {list_name} with books matching {query} and options {options}.

prompts.name: manage_book_formats_prompt
prompts.description: Manage ebook formats for books
prompts.template: {action} the {format} format for book with ID {book_id} with options {options}.

prompts.name: search_online_metadata_prompt
prompts.description: Search for book metadata online
prompts.template: Search for metadata for '{title}' by {author} from {sources} with options {options}.

prompts.name: manage_libraries_prompt
prompts.description: Manage multiple Calibre libraries
prompts.template: {action} library at {library_path} with options {options}.

prompts.name: manage_reading_progress_prompt
prompts.description: Track and manage reading progress
prompts.template: Update reading progress for book with ID {book_id} to {position}% with options {options}.

prompts.name: manage_annotations_prompt
prompts.description: Manage book annotations and highlights
prompts.template: {action} annotations for book with ID {book_id} with options {options}.
